AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court that denied Ramon De La Cruz's motion to dismiss and presided over his trial
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz's trial: trial of Ramon De La Cruz for smuggling undocumented aliens, began after denial of motion to dismiss
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: defendant who requested continuances to prepare for trial
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.motion to dismiss the indictment: motion filed by Ramon De La Cruz, denied by the United States District Court
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Speedy Trial Act: governs the timing of trials, including exclusions for certain periods
